doc:
Michael Chapin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Chapin 0 Michael Chapin (born July 25, 1936) is an American former child actor in film and television. Born in Los Angeles, he began his screen career in 1944 when he appeared in The Fighting Sullivans. He continued with films such as It's a Wonderful Life and Under California Stars. Acting mostly in western pictures, he retired from show business in 1959.Michael Chapin is the older brother of Billy Chapin and Lauren Chapin. Michael_Chapin ( born July_25_,_1936 ) is an_American_former_child_actor in film_and_television . Born in Los_Angeles , he began his_screen_career in 1944 when he appeared in The_Fighting_Sullivans . He continued with films such as It 's a_Wonderful_Life and Under California_Stars . Acting_mostly in western_pictures , he retired from show_business in 1959 . Michael_Chapin is the_older_brother of Billy_Chapin and Lauren_Chapin .
